articles.title: ‘Traumatic’: Maine family, with two high schoolers, detained at Canadian border
articles.description:
A mother and her three teenagers were detained at the Canadian border. Two are students at two Portland high schools.

The post ‘Traumatic’: Maine family, with two high schoolers, detained at Canadian border appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Update: ‘Traumatic’: Maine family, with two high schoolers

Details:

A mother and her three teenagers were detained
